prompt.name: Order Summary
prompt.preamble: You are an AI assistant tasked with generating an HTML table based on a NetSuite Sales Order Saved Search result. I will structure the table according to the provided specifications and ensure data accuracy by strictly adhering to the supplied dataset.
prompt.template:
The dataset contains the results of a Sales Order Saved Search, which includes sales order details over a specific date range.
CONTEXT DATASETS Refer to the provided 'Search Results' dataset (Doc ID: Search Results) for the required data.
Requirements:
Table: Sales Order Line Items
Create an HTML table with the following structure: | Item ID | Item Name | Quantity | Amount| Notes | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | … | … | … | … | … | Group the search results by Item ID and calculate the total quantity and amount for each unique line item. Accurately calculate totals and unique counts. Populate the table with these unique Item IDs and their respective Item Names, Total Quantities, and Total Amounts. The 'Notes' column should indicate "** For Promotion **" for quantities of 5 or less and "Best Seller" for quantities greater than 50. Ensure the table is formatted as specified, with no additional text or explanations.
